name: Beeswax
tagline: Anti-Exfiltration Web Application Platform (Google Chrome Extension)
body:
### Welcome to Beeswax Pages.

This is the landing page for the Beeswax-related privacy projects. Refer to the individual repos for instructions on installing and using:

The Beeswax extension browser Platform: [Repo](https://github.com/web-priv/beeswax)

The current applications:

  - Modified KiwiIRC with support for encrypted channels: [Repo](https://github.com/web-priv/KiwiIRC)

  - Picsure encrypted photo sharing: [Repo](https://github.com/web-priv/picsure)

### Contact Authors

You may contact @init-js for assistance and help installing/running the software.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
